item.title: ::bank Command PI Rep++
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { c.getPA().openUpBank(); }

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bankall")) { for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) { for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) { c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); c.sendMessage("You deposit all your items into your bank"); } } }

Rep is to be handed out by the OPâ€™s discretion not by request.
